00036 /* Keep redraw state when preempting to process certain events */
00037 struct gerbv_redraw_state {
00038     int valid;                     /* Set to nonzero when data is valid */
00039     int file_index;
00040     GdkPixmap *curr_pixmap;
00041     GdkPixmap *clipmask;
00042     int max_width;
00043     int max_height;
00044     int files_loaded;
00045 };
